languages.text: Оружие, принесенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать наготове.

traits.locale_text: Охваченные бунтом палубы — не самое безопасное место в галактике. Оружие, предложенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать под рукой.

languages.text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.
languages.original_text: Оружие, принесенное сенешалем Абеляром Версерианом, лучше держать наготове.

traits.locale_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.
The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.
There are fewer places in the galaxy more dangerous than open voidship decks in the midst of a revolt. The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept close at hand.
The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.
The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.
The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

languages.text: Du solltest die Waffe von Truchsess Abelard Werserian griffbereit haben.
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt nur wenige Ort in der Galaxie, die gefährlicher sind als offene Raumschiffdecks während einer Revolte. Die von Truchsess Abelard Werserian angebotene Waffe sollte stets griffbereit sein.

languages.text: Mieux vaut garder l'arme offerte par le sénéchal Abélard Werserian à portée de main.
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: Rares sont les endroits dans la galaxie plus dangereux que les ponts ouverts d'un vaisseau en pleine révolte. Mieux vaut garder l'arme offerte par le sénéchal Abélard Werserian à portée de main.

languages.text: 你应该随身带好阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供的武器。
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: 在整个银河系中，没有哪里比暴乱状态下的虚空舰甲板更危险。你应该随身带好阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领提供的武器。

languages.text: 家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンから差し出された武器は手近に置いておくべきだ。
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: 家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンから差し出された武器は手近に置いておくべきだ。

languages.text: Deberías preparar el arma que te ofrece el Senescal Abelard Werserian.
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: Hay pocos lugares más peligrosos en la galaxia que una cubierta de nave del vacío durante un motín. El arma ofrecida por el Senescal Abelard Werserian es algo que resultará útil.

languages.text: Seneşal Abelard Werserian'ın verdiği silahın hazırda tutulması iyi olur.
languages.original_text: The weapon offered by Seneschal Abelard Werserian should be kept at the ready.

traits.locale_text: Seneşal Abelard Werserian'ın verdiği silahın hazırda tutulması iyi olur.
